description: Tools for monitoring the behavior of the Bifrost application

panels.title: Occurrence of time spent queued in a mailbox (us)

panels.content:
### Distribution of time in mailbox
---
This metric is computed by summing the timer distribution of all messages for each actor

panels.description:
Shows the number of processed messages for each actor.

Base metric: akka.group.processing-time
Type: timer
Description: Tracks the time taken for a member actor to process the receive function.
panels.title: Number of messages processed by each actor

panels.content:
### Distribution of time in mailbox
---
This metric is computed by summing the timer distribution of all messages for each actor

panels.description:
Takes the histogram of processing times and sums it for each time period reported.

Base metric: akka.group.processing-time 
Description: Tracks the time taken for a member actor to process the receive function.

**NOTE:** The Y-axis is log-scaled
panels.title: Total time spent processing messages

panels.content:
### Distribution of time in mailbox
---
This metric is computed by summing the timer distribution of all messages for each actor

panels.description:
Shows the mean time to process messages for each actor. This is computed by summing the total time spent processing messages and dividing by the total number of messages processed.

Base metric: akka.group.processing-time
Description: Tracks the time taken for a member actor to process the receive function.
panels.title: Average time to process a message

panels.content:
### Distribution of time in mailbox
---
This metric is computed by summing the timer distribution of all messages for each actor

panels.description:
Shows the mean time to dequeue a message for processing for each actor. This is computed by summing the total time spent by dequeued messages in the mailbox and dividing by the total number of dequeued messages.

Base metric: akka.actor.time-in-mailbox
Type: timer
Description: Tracks the time since the instant a message is enqueued in an Actor's mailbox until it is dequeued for processing.
panels.title: Average time a message is in a mailbox

panels.description:
executor.threads.min gauge
Tracks executor minimum number of Threads.

executor.threads.max gauge
Tracks executor maximum number of Threads.
panels.title: Executor threads minimum

panels.title: Executor threads minimum

title: Bifrost Monitor
